definitions.text: uneducated in general; lacking knowledge or sophistication
examples: an unlearned group incapable of understanding complex issues
exhibiting contempt for his unlettered companions

definitions.text: uneducated in the fundamentals of a given art or branch of learning; lacking knowledge of a specific field
examples: she is ignorant of quantum mechanics

definitions.text: unaware because of a lack of relevant information or knowledge
examples: he was completely ignorant of the circumstances
